game.name: Fields of Mistria

game.shortDescription: Start your new life! Build the farm of your dreams as you discover a world brimming with possibilities. Magic, romance, and adventure all await you in this nostalgic farming / life sim RPG!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Start your new life! Build the farm of your dreams as you discover a world brimming with possibilities. Magic, romance, and adventure all await you in this nostalgic farming / life sim RPG!

reviewHighlights.text: The dragon god told me to not forget there was a jump button. I said "wait there's a jump button?" and then i jumped 10/10 would jump again
If you enjoy Stardew Valley or Sun Haven then you'll enjoy this game. It's nice and cozy, everything is pretty intuitive if you've played a "farm sim"...
